nodes.bodyText: What does it mean for a hash database to have an index only, but no index path?

Central repo DBs are like that - we set them as index only but they have no path to that index on disk. The second test that databasePath is non-empty isn't currently necessary but seemed safer to include in case we ever change this (and we'll never want to copy an empty path...)
I think a comment is in order then. If I wondered at this, someone else is likely to do so in the future.
